job.title: Software Engineer
job.description:
Fremont is a startup sports wagering fund, founded by wall street analysts who built a better way to trade on sports. Through our own trading we have developed software that improves how we make wagering decisions. We have now branched off to create a second company that will commercialize this software and bring it to the public via a website and mobile app. We are looking for programmers highly proficient in Python, Django, AWS and scalability to help us build out this software. 


Your compensation will be meaningful equity ownership.


Responsibilities

  • Develop and expand upon existing Python code
  • Integrate third-party APIs between our database and the front-end
  • Work closely with our current programming team to finish the first iteration of the product


Qualifications

  • Ability to dedicate 40+ hours per week (we are flexible for when you are available)
  • In-depth knowledge of Python and Django
